short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This app is for DropShippers.Analyze Shopify Stores and Find Trending Products.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome Extension is only for Dropshippers.This app help you estimate the revenue that a particular shopify store is making,thus enabling you to market same or similar products on your own store.This app provides "New & Trending " products and trending new Video Ads daily  that are unsaturated and are added by big shopify stores helping you identify the winning products before anyone else and taking advantage of them ASAP.Also find the best selling products of any store and get inspiration.
